Welcome to Mail, an email client custom-made for Xiaomi by Kingsoft. You can use this app to compose, send, and receive emails.
Email is a MIUI system application. After uninstalling, you will not be able to add email accounts, send and receive emails, and synchronize email schedules.

Touch & hold to select one conversation, then touch to select more.
This email is too big to load, only display part of it and please go through all on PC later

Mail is an email client that can manage multiple accounts, send and receive emails, as well as sync your calendar info and contacts. Make sure you can do without these features before you uninstall the app. Your Exchange contacts and calendar info will be deleted too.
"If you forgot your password or need to check the status of your account, use the web version of NetEase Mail. You can also get help in WeChat: "
1. Email password can be used when no authorization code was set up in the email client and POP3/IMAP/SMTP services were enabled.
2. Third party authorization codes can be used to sign in in third party email clients when POP3/IMAP/SMTP services are enabled.
"You'll be redirected to Microsoft to enter password"
"Sign in with OAuth (Personal Outlook users cannot synchronize their calendars when logging in with OAuth)"
Load emails when using mobile data
Attachments in your forwarded message will be downloaded prior to sending.
Allow Mi Wallet to analyze and manage your bills automatically. This feature is turned off by default for work-related email addresses.

Allows app to access your email, usernames, and passwords
For accessing emails of your contacts in order to autocomplete recipients
For creating new emails, as well as saving and adding attachments
"Allows app to read your emails' attachments"
When the switch is toggled on, you agree that we may collect your personal data. You can toggle the switch off, revoke your authorization, and delete your data from our servers at any time.
"Analyze bills and travel info in your email to receive reminders about payments and trips"
Only allow manual sync while roaming
Tap “Activate” to set up mail server.
In POP3, attachments will be automatically downloaded with email. This may increase your mobile data usage.
"Logs contain debugging info of the email client and your device info. This information is used to locate problems faster. By tapping \"%1$s\" below, you're agreeing to our \"%2$s\"."
Tap the upper right corner to go to settings after you agree
Try using WPS Office to open this attachment.
"Couldn't find an app for this attachment. Try using WPS Office."
No application found to handle this action
Copied successfully. Go back to the sign-in page and paste the code into the password form.
Copy verification code, tap \"Enter username and password to sign in\" on the sign-in page, and paste the code into the password form.
Get a new code from %s to sign in.
"If you forgot your password or need to check the status of your account, use the web version of QQ Mail. You can also get help in WeChat: "
1. QQ password can be used when no independent password or authorization code was set up with IMAP/Exchange protocols.
2. Independent password can be used when no authorization code was set up with IMAP/Exchange protocols.
"3. Authorization codes generated for third party email clients can also be used for signing in. If you forgot your code, refer to this link: "
"Note: If you've already set up a password, you'll need to verify it when you sign in."
"Can't find your sent emails? Tap here to learn what you can do."
Sync sent messages from QQ Mail

"Let's set up a meeting to discuss this."

"The certificate's issuer is not a trusted organization."
